00021 template<typename Pointer>
00022 class TDeleteAdapter
00023 {
00024 public:
00025        typedef Pointer* ElementType;
00026 
00027        static Pointer* GetPtr(const ElementType& element)
00028        {
00029               return element;
00030        }
00031 
00032        static Pointer* PopPtr(const ElementType& element)
00033        {
00034               return GetPtr(element);
00035        }
00036 
00037        static void Delete(const ElementType& element)
00038        {
00039               delete element;
00040        }
00041 };
00042 
00043 
00048 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter = TDeleteAdapter<Pointer> >
00049 class TPointerVector
00050 {
00051 public:
00052        typedef typename AccessAdapter::ElementType ElementType;
00053 
00054        enum
00055        {
00059               InvalidIndex = -1
00060        };
00061 
00062        TPointerVector();
00063        TPointerVector(const TPointerVector&);
00064 
00065        ~TPointerVector();
00066 
00070        bool IsEmpty() const;
00071 
00075        int GetCount() const;
00076 
00080        void SetCount(int count);
00081 
00085        void Reset();
00086 
00091        int HasElement(const Pointer* elementPtr) const;
00092 
00096        Pointer* GetAt(int index) const;
00097 
00102        const ElementType& GetElementAt(int index) const;
00103 
00107        void SetElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element);
00108 
00114        void RemoveAt(int index);
00115 
00122        bool Remove(Pointer* elementPtr);
00123 
00128        Pointer* PopAt(int index);
00129 
00133        void PushBack(const ElementType& element);
00134 
00138        void InsertElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element);
00139 
00140 private:
00141        typedef std::vector<ElementType> Elements;
00142 
00143        Elements m_elements;
00144 };

00192 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00193 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::Reset()
00194 {
00195        for (         typename Elements::iterator iter = m_elements.begin();
00196                             iter != m_elements.end();
00197                             ++iter){
00198               AccessAdapter::Delete(*iter);
00199        }
00200 
00201        m_elements.clear();
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00206 int TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::HasElement(const Pointer* elementPtr) const
00207 {
00208        int elementsCount = GetCount();
00209 
00210        for (int elementIndex = 0; elementIndex < elementsCount; elementIndex++){
00211               typename Elements::const_iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + elementIndex);
00212               if (AccessAdapter::GetPtr(*delIter) == elementPtr){
00213                      return elementIndex;
00214               }
00215        }
00216 
00217        return InvalidIndex;
00218 }

00221 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00222 Pointer* TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::GetAt(int index) const
00223 {
00224        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00225        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00226 
00227        return AccessAdapter::GetPtr(m_elements[index]);
00228 }

00234        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00235        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00236

00248 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00249 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::RemoveAt(int index)
00250 {
00251        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00252        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00253 
00254        typename Elements::iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + index);
00255 
00256        AccessAdapter::Delete(*delIter);
00257 
00258        m_elements.erase(delIter);
00259 }
00260 
00261        
00262 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00263 bool TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::Remove(Pointer* elementPtr)
00264 {
00265        int elementsCount = GetCount();
00266 
00267        for (int elementIndex = 0; elementIndex < elementsCount; elementIndex++){
00268               typename Elements::iterator delIter = (m_elements.begin() + elementIndex);
00269               if (AccessAdapter::GetPtr(*delIter) == elementPtr){
00270                      RemoveAt(elementIndex);
00271 
00272                      return true;
00273               }
00274        }
00275 
00276        return false;
00277 }

00280 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00281 Pointer* TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::PopAt(int index)
00282 {
00283        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00284        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_elements.size()));
00285 
00286        Pointer* popPtr = AccessAdapter::PopPtr(m_elements[index]);
00287 
00288        m_elements.erase(m_elements.begin() + index);
00289 
00290        return popPtr;
00291 }

00294 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00295 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::PushBack(const ElementType& element)
00296 {
00297        m_elements.push_back(element);
00298 }

00301 template <typename Pointer, class AccessAdapter>
00302 void TPointerVector<Pointer, AccessAdapter>::InsertElementAt(int index, const ElementType& element)
00303 {
00304        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00305        I_ASSERT(index <= GetCount());
00306        I_ASSERT(HasElement(AccessAdapter::GetPtr(element)) == InvalidIndex);
00307 
00308        m_elements.insert(m_elements.begin() + index, element);
00309 }
